text:
Hello All,

I am using the HubL variable `{% request.geoip_country %}`, and it was returning the correct output until a few days ago. Recently, it has been consistently returning 'us' regardless of the VPN region I am connected to. Is there any issue on HubSpot's side?

Can anybody help ?
I am also getting the same issue. Any urgent help would be greatly appreciated.

Hello!
I've noticed that the `request.query_dict` variable isn't functioning as expected on two different portals. Has anyone else experienced this issue? Any insights or solutions would be greatly appreciated.
